info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 2:20PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Madison and central Beaverhead Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorm centered near Dillon, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
